query: What is the open rate for my last campaign in Klaviyo?
response: The open rate for your last campaign in Klaviyo is 25%. You can view more detailed analytics on the Klaviyo dashboard.

execution_details.implementation: Use the Klaviyo API to fetch campaign metrics, then extract the open rate for the last campaign
execution_details.error_handling: Check for API rate limits, handle 404 errors for non-existent campaigns, and validate API responses

query: How many customers have placed an order in the last 30 days?
response: There have been 150 customers who placed an order in the last 30 days. You can view more customer insights on the Klaviyo dashboard.

execution_details.implementation: Use the Klaviyo API to fetch person data, then filter by 'placed_order' metric within the last 30 days
execution_details.error_handling: Check for API rate limits, handle 404 errors for non-existent persons, and validate API responses

query: What is the average order value for customers who received my last email campaign?
response: The average order value for customers who received your last email campaign is $50. You can view more detailed analytics on the Klaviyo dashboard.

execution_details.implementation: Use the Klaviyo API to fetch campaign metrics, then extract the average order value for the last campaign
execution_details.error_handling: Check for API rate limits, handle 404 errors for non-existent campaigns, and validate API responses

query: Can I get a list of customers who have not made a purchase in the last 60 days?
response: Here is the list of 200 customers who have not made a purchase in the last 60 days. You can view more customer insights on the Klaviyo dashboard.

execution_details.implementation: Use the Klaviyo API to fetch person data, then filter by 'placed_order' metric outside of the last 60 days
execution_details.error_handling: Check for API rate limits, handle 404 errors for non-existent persons, and validate API responses

query: What is the conversion rate for my last automation workflow?
response: The conversion rate for your last automation workflow is 15%. You can view more detailed analytics on the Klaviyo dashboard.

execution_details.implementation: Use the Klaviyo API to fetch workflow metrics, then extract the conversion rate for the last workflow
execution_details.error_handling: Check for API rate limits, handle 404 errors for non-existent workflows, and validate API responses
